title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: When using the ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet, it does not size correctly.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor should size correctly in the property sheet.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Use the ComboBoxCellEditor on a property field.
3. Observe that the ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly.
